website_summaries.verdict: Amazon's mobile music app lets you take your Prime Music on the go, but artist omissions and performance issues may steer you away from this music-streaming app.
cons: Missing Universal Music Group and some major artists

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry but sort it out. Use to have Spotify and will be returning to it soon, the songs often freezes if I go onto an album it only shows the songs that I have in a playlist Spotify is so much easier to use and works perfectly even with my alexa I ask it to play songs and then it doesn't play anything, this is just awful you need to seriously sort it out,
customer_reviews.author: jonathan salmon

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Music - App
customer_reviews.text: Like quality of what is included in AM and prime movie cost/mth. Dislike that the music app is geared to amazon music unlimited which is a further £7.99/mth and very easy to sign up to without realising. No thanks button first call. Yet to establish how to download songs for later use. Not that clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use very song possible amazing if you have a p30 pro you have to down load amazon App Store then download amazon music unlimited due to it not being on the App Store for some reason also you can scroll up on the two line above the song and the lyrics come mini karaoke
customer_reviews.author: stan

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Am using this with Echo, seemslike you can't get Alexa to play an album, just the artist on shuffle or a particular song, maybe I just don't word it right, early days. Sound quality excellent and so easy
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Good veriety of music
customer_reviews.text: It's an excelent service if you are a Prime member, the collections of music per decade is good, Alexa will play anything you want, also available are podcasts. It suits me down to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: MP3 player
customer_reviews.text: I loaded it on to my android tablet to give me access to the music stored on my Amazon cloud facility that I use with my kindle fire. I'm happy with the function of the app with the exception that it is linked to the USA music store and not UK. I have not been able to change it. Apart from that, it does what I wanted it to do, which is to access my Amazon music library from the cloud on my tablet.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: IS THIS THE END OF RADIO?
customer_reviews.text: Great app. I downloaded the app yesterday as it also gives you access to Alexa. Great way to access the music on Music Prime. I have just connected my phone to my car using Bluetooth and I now am able to access a lot of music when I am out and about and not rely on the same old music played by the same old radiol stations.
customer_reviews.author: Tepid Nebula

customer_reviews.title: double the music
customer_reviews.text: when you buy a cd that is combatable with amazon music ( used to be cloud) it automatically downloads a mp3 version to the amazon music player ! so you don't have to wait for the cd to arrive ,just open the player and start to listen to your music,and you still get the hard copy as a backup,or use in the car hope this is of help its a great piece of software well recommended
customer_reviews.author: B. Fildes

customer_reviews.title: Music to my ears
customer_reviews.text: Great choice of music,very good sound quality especially with hd version,will be signing up for that when free trial ends,Spotify premium is good Amazon music is better,very happy listener :))
customer_reviews.author: stuart ford

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant App
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon music app is brilliant. I've been using it for music unlimited as I like the wider choice of music. Used it a couple of years, no problems at all. Works great in the car on Bluetooth from streaming new albums etc
customer_reviews.author: Andy G

customer_reviews.title: Shocking now you have to pay
customer_reviews.text: Shocking now you have to pay extra for all music, this was part of the reason i had prime
customer_reviews.author: craig allcock

customer_reviews.title: Unlimited is great
customer_reviews.text: I can play nearly every album I’ve ever had for less than the price of a cd
customer_reviews.author: SPIKE

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Music App
customer_reviews.text: I have listened to musc on my smartphone through the app. When the music is playing it will jump for a second a few times while I am listening to the song? It can be very annoying. On the other hand it is nice to listen to songs I had not heard before or from a long time ago as part of my Amazon Prime subscription.
customer_reviews.author: A. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Good app
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a while, was nice and had to nice music player
customer_reviews.author: sumit irachande

customer_reviews.title: app need a few tweeks
customer_reviews.text: Clunky needs a just show prime option and ability to add specific artists and albums as playlists. The choice of music is ok, I am reserved in my review because to compare to services that are solely for music wouldn't be fair given the price point. The app itself though does need a few small improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Can't get this to work, keeps telling me to update to the latest app version. Just downloaded the app so it is the latest version..... Also tells me account information is missing, no info found on what is missing or how to correct the issue. Delete and back to Spotify.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Wintershoven

customer_reviews.title: Slows up on Android 4 +
customer_reviews.text: Making playlists , finding music spot on .Not sure if it is my phone only a android 4.2 but it sticks and slows up then crashes sometimes apart from that it would be five 🌟 I would of rated
customer_reviews.author: ebeneezergb

customer_reviews.title: It makes sense to change over
customer_reviews.text: I was paying monthly for Spotify and I hadn't heard of Amazon music. As I'm already paying for Prime anyway it made sense to change over. It am very pleased with it and there's a great choice of music.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good app
customer_reviews.text: Works well but noticed if you listen to certain songs a lot they disappear on to unlimited prime
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent concept but with limitation
customer_reviews.text: The concept is brilliant and the sound reproduction superb. The limitation of being able to store and play Prime music only on a mobile device using the app is the only aspect which prevents an award of 5 stars - I most commonly listen to music in the car via tracks stored on a memory stick and so cannot do this with Prime music tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but need more practice
customer_reviews.text: I'll need to update as I go but from the first few uses... I like that I can stream current music.... I found it difficult to navigate though, searching for music was a bit complicated. I'm nervous about accidentally buying music that's not clearly labelled as something you need to pay for.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Ace
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic app which works on my Samsung Galaxy Tab S2. Amazon Music comes with a vast range of music from many different years.The best feature is that it can be registered on upto 10 devices. I also like how all the music is in one place and it comes at a very cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Keeps stopping lately
customer_reviews.text: Does anyone else's keep freezing then stops? It use to be a good app. Getting fed up with it. Amazon sort it out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Apparently not good for changingadding devices
customer_reviews.text: Cannot add my android s6 says need computer I only have tablet and S6 mobile
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality not as good as Poweramp android app, everything else is good.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: The audio glitches quite a lot when playing audio downloaded ...
customer_reviews.text: The audio glitches quite a lot when playing audio downloaded from prime library. Doesn't do it when I'm playing the mp3s already on my phone, just the downloaded Amazon tracks. I've been using Deezer and Google Play now for about two years and they don't have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: App is Slow and sometimes doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Whether I downloaded this app from Google Play or the Amazon Appstore the App would be really sluggish and in some cases just not work at all. I have a moto G(4) Plus and most apps work on it. It surpises me that Amazon Music doens't and yet other musics streaming apps do.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good app, needs a few tweaks to make it great.
customer_reviews.text: Good app, as a Google Play Music user there are some missing features like being able to create a radio station from an artist, album or track. Other than this small issue very usable and the streaming quality of the music is fine.
customer_reviews.author: neil-j

customer_reviews.title: The Nearly App
customer_reviews.text: Could be great, two main probs: no download to SD card option so have to move manually, which will play so it can read from SD; sort by album splits various artists into separate albums which is major pain. One star lost for each. Sort these and you have a five star app.
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Smooth operation. Great music suggestions spanning genres
customer_reviews.text: Smooth operation. Great music suggestions spanning genres. I would like to see more vinyl options.
customer_reviews.author: Brian O

customer_reviews.title: Android from Mac
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest way to put music onto an Android phone after trying several unsuccessful workarounds on an iMac.
customer_reviews.author: papert

customer_reviews.title: Listen up.
customer_reviews.text: Great to have access to all the music I have purchased over the years from Amazon, some of it still worthy of listening too :) A nice app, I don't need to upload anything personally but being able to do so to the cloud would be very useful to most music fans on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Meister

customer_reviews.title: Music to my ears.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, music is a few clicks away, so far I haven't searched for anything and been unable to find what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Morrall

customer_reviews.title: iTunes beater!
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my iPad, Android phone and Windows 8 and 7 computers means I can have access to my music wherever I go, the app even integrates my iTunes purchases. It is slick to operate and whether streaming or downloading, it has never failed to delight me! I am suddenly buying and playing music again :)
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Gary Gee-Gelder

customer_reviews.title: Trying to load app on my android smart phone and it is not easy to access my ...
customer_reviews.text: Trying to load app on my android smart phone and it is not easy to access my account to load the app. Once loaded I am able to play my music from the cloud or my device so it is very useful. I have not yet downloaded or bought music from Amazon but have imported my ITunes music to Amazon player - very easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: RogerP

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Constant Error 200 when trying to download. Sometimes works, then loses all the downloads, try to pull them down again, error 200. Rinse, repeat.
customer_reviews.author: Pest

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: You get warned about streaming and directed to download. It doesn't download 1st time but on the 2nd you get a confirmation. Then, it takes ages for it to download so you try streaming again and there's interruptions on playback. This app needs serious work! Like the added music on prime though so 2 stars until fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Superb - with minor flaws!
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant addition to Prime and is surprisingly comprehensive - I have found hundreds and hundreds of tracks to listen to. A minor quibble is that the interface isn't perfect yet - we need to be able to see all the upcoming tracks on an album or playlist much more easily. Otherwise, this is brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Uninstall then reinstall after latest update.
customer_reviews.text: After the update, it caused bluetooth issues. Just uninstall the app, reinstall and restart your phone. Works fine now.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to navigate but not the best setup
customer_reviews.text: Has deleted my offline songs a couple of times now, not really sure why. I could probably look into it but as I already use other music apps, I dont see the point. Fairly easy to navigate but not the best setup. I only really downloaded it as I am a Prime customer anyway and wanted to see if it was worth using as my everyday music player. I dont
customer_reviews.author: Chris Grace

customer_reviews.title: Lack of Sonos playback for UK is pretty poor for what could have been excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Would give Prime Music 5 stars but the lack of Sonos playback support in the UK (only available in US) is a serious oversight by Amazon and given I listen to most of my music via Sonos it makes Prime Music pretty much pointless. Would have been 5 stars otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Emagica

customer_reviews.title: Good value with Prime
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased when this became part of the Prime package. The choice of music doesn't seem as extensive as other dedicated music sites, nor is the detailed information on some of the offerings. The issues described might improve with time. but as a freebie with Prime, it's excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Dodster

customer_reviews.title: not a great business model as far as music is concerned
customer_reviews.text: This review based on the fact I thought the album I bought would download to my phone and to my Poweramp app ,low and behold I feel forced to have Amazon player which I did not want at all...... So they got 1.99 off me butvthst will be all they'll get....not a great business model as far as music is concerned....
customer_reviews.author: honesty

customer_reviews.title: Good variety
customer_reviews.text: It's very good choice but keeps stopping on different tracks before righting itself
customer_reviews.author: chris bere

customer_reviews.title: Use offline good price
customer_reviews.text: Works well easy to use they are a good selection of songs easy to make a playlist listen to music offline and a good price
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Thomas morgan

customer_reviews.title: Prime it is not.
customer_reviews.text: Not at all impressed with this. I have a prime account but I can't get the Android app to sign in with my existing account. I'm also concerned that I have to enter credit card details again when Amazon have these details and the service is free with Prime. A complete #fail in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Le Badger

customer_reviews.title: Good music choice
customer_reviews.text: Good app but keeps asking you to join prime music when you just want to purchase a song
customer_reviews.author: PETER HILLAND

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat limited in albums
customer_reviews.text: All music should be Free for prime members but it's not
customer_reviews.author: MarkieM

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I already have this app on my pc and mobile and is good.
customer_reviews.author: Jude Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Good easy player
customer_reviews.text: Great easy to use player with a good selection of music. Occasional sound quality issues but I am not sure if this is because of my internet or the fact I am on basic prime but compared with Spotify free service the sound quality isn't as good.
customer_reviews.author: S. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: was very pleased when I found that I could download it onto ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used Amazon Music for a about a year now, was very pleased when I found that I could download it onto my Smart phone, so now I carry my Music on Ipad and Android phone. I like the idea that I can download from the cloud the albums I want and can leave in the cloud all the ones I don't. Works very well for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. A. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Like the way the importer matches the music to reduce ...
customer_reviews.text: Like the way the importer matches the music to reduce the download times by taking from the Amazon database and improve the performance. The interface is nice and clear and (i like the choice of black!). One minor gripe is that if you upload your own music there does not appear to be an option to insert some album cover artwork
customer_reviews.author: Geezer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate having music included with Prime, but it crashes a lot and there a quite a few faults, so I would not upgrade to the monthly subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Loving this app, our whole family have this on their phones (2 adults & 2 young girls) and we all have our own playlist saved - works through the Bluetooth from my car to my phone so the car stereo is a thing of the past. Brilliant
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs F

customer_reviews.title: Music
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but disappointed some of the old stuff I like is only on unlimited.
customer_reviews.author: raycougar

customer_reviews.title: Filters needed
customer_reviews.text: I like the Amazon music app generally. It doesn't compare to the content of Spotify though. I cant let my young children use it though- it has no setting to filter out songs with explicit lyrics and they can buy things a bit too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mr L C Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmmm
customer_reviews.text: Was loving this app until I tried it in the car and realised you can't use it without Internet access no good when you are driving through countryside that has little or no signal... may as well put the cds in the car which defeated the object
customer_reviews.author: rachel moss

customer_reviews.title: Essential app for playing amazon cloud MP3's on your mobile
customer_reviews.text: With this app anything you buy in the amazon MP3 music store can be played on your mobile or tablet, its easy to manage your collection and play lists on your PC, and download what you want to your phone. The app is FREE, but you will have to buy the MP3's on the amazon MP3 store or choose CD's from amazon with the FREE MP3 offers.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Turner

customer_reviews.title: Love it, I've always had trouble with Windows player ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it , I've always had trouble with Windows player trying to get the balance right , but with Amazon music , no problemo. The display is also very good showing not only the downloads from Amazon , but also all of the albums listed on the PC.So easy to use as well. Totally recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Franco Mulinos

customer_reviews.title: A must.
customer_reviews.text: A MUST HAVE for anyone who listeners to music. I still use mp3 players and have found that Amazon's library and system is the best. I now also use a tablet (Kindle Fire HDX) in additional source as the speaker system obviate headphones. I Always seem to say 'marvellous" - but the word fits!!.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Graham Cunliffe

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I've been waiting for from Amazon. I refuse to let apple run my life. Player itself is great. A simple feature that annoys me that I couldn't get from other players is that it lists the current track number (e.g. playing 1 of 6). Player toggles between Amazon Cloud and tracks on my device (Arnova 10 G2 Tablet) with no problems. Really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love this music app
customer_reviews.text: Love this music app, a massive collection of old and new music. Really like the ability to play it off line. Only giving it 3* due to amazons inability to get certified so I need to switch off my security any time I want to download anything from them.
customer_reviews.author: Greebo

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I bought some CD's from Amazon - yes people do still actually buy music - and they were also available to download, so as well as having a hard copy CD I also have the music on my phone and tablet. It's brilliant and I will continue to do the same in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Bob R

customer_reviews.title: Probably great for small libraries.
customer_reviews.text: I am probably in a small minority in that I have in excess of 40,000 songs in my library. With so many songs, Amazon's music apps appear slow, clunky, and do not even seem to show all songs. I periodically give the Amazon music apps a try in the hope that the developers will have addressed the problems, and, so far, I have periodically been disappointed. Maybe next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good library
customer_reviews.text: Initially sceptical, but very much converted. I just make sure that it operates on wifi-only downloading to stop my data being used.
customer_reviews.author: MR Y

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Wow, just discovered this service and downloaded the app to my phone. Excellent range of free music and although I don't use my phone for listening I used screen mirroring to put it through the smart TV and the sound quality was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: anthill1956

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant new prime experience
customer_reviews.text: Genius! It's going to take me a month of Sundays to go through all the music on offer. Prime does it again - it's brilliant value for money. I already have some lovely summer music streaming going on - no adverts and all the music I love. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Bibliobeck

customer_reviews.title: Good list of downloads
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and a the sound when used with headphones .
customer_reviews.author: CLIVE.

customer_reviews.title: Not that great. Spam!
customer_reviews.text: Took ages to work out how to play music offline. Also first off when I went to add a device (this was wrong) it took me through steps to download an app that needs permission to e.g record my voice without knowing it. I installed trusting amazon, but the next day I found 20 spam emails in my inbox. This was unusual and some seem to relate to apps and games. I suspect this app had something to do with it. Also I find even music playing offline stops or stutters.
customer_reviews.author: Mel B.

customer_reviews.title: Slow, Forceful and Terrible collection of music.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon Music free with prime, I wish i could say it is good, but barely any music in its collection and the app is slow and dreadful, keeps trying to force you to buy songs even with prime.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great app. It always works and there's a lot of prime music to listen to. I hope Amazon will keep adding more music to it!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: I'm hooked!
customer_reviews.text: Just brilliant! I'm discovering lots of new music, and rediscovering lots of old stuff too. Really great that all my old CDs that I bought through amazon are available instantly, as well as so much more to explore. I especially love the playlists for working to.
customer_reviews.author: HJC

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: This has changed my music buying significantly. As soon as I hear something I like on the TV or radio I can search it on here and have it in my collection within minutes. Having your card details already registered is proving expensive though because its so easy to just order anytime. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: bassmanuk

customer_reviews.title: Love music
customer_reviews.text: I love music all my friends chill out with me and the sounds I love prime tv I love buying my dogs flea treatment
customer_reviews.author: julie kelly

customer_reviews.title: good app, use it on my samsung galaxy s5 ...
customer_reviews.text: good app, use it on my samsung galaxy s5 and on my fire stick. It could do with more music on there. one other problem is it can only be used on one device at a time. otherwise great addition to prime membership
customer_reviews.author: Alex irving

customer_reviews.title: Probably the most pointless app, why?
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most pointless app, why? - Update recognises I am not in US and then entirely fails to work. so old issue may have been solved who knows?
customer_reviews.author: MBT Salisbury

customer_reviews.title: Used to
customer_reviews.text: Used to work on my Blackberry Q10 but doesn't any more. :.-)
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Farrar

customer_reviews.title: OK but too limited at the moment.
customer_reviews.text: Not that great, very limited selections of some artists. The app is ok but getting around your library is a bit cumbersome. A nice add-on for existing Prime users but not something I'd say was a deal-clincher. If you are getting prime for other reasons its nice to have this as well but other subscription services are better for music.
customer_reviews.author: JinjaBeardy

customer_reviews.title: A fair start
customer_reviews.text: As a Prime customer I looked forward to the launch of Prime music. Whilst not being totally disappointed I wont be leaving Spotify yet. The music library is small in comparison, the sound quality is not great. But its free and without ads, so I might keep dipping in. It would be also helpful if Amazon sorted it the ability to scrobble to Last FM
customer_reviews.author: D. Parr

customer_reviews.title: Best music app ive found
customer_reviews.text: I love this app it's fab!! I have tried many others that I always ended up un-installing so much music and I've never had issues with crashing it's great and is very easy to navigate around best music app I have found
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Thompson

customer_reviews.title: This could be a great service although the choice of music is limited to ...
customer_reviews.text: This could be a great service although the choice of music is limited to each artist, What lets it down is the fact that Prime Music is not available on Sonos, this is a major let down, after all what's the point of listening to music on your phone or tablet when you have a home music system like Sonos. Google Play and Napster are available on Sonos. Come on Amazon, compete seriously!
customer_reviews.author: Mr P A Haden

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this for mobile rather than carry my ipod around all the time. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: maggie45

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I love the ability to buy and download my songs through Amazon prime music. I just hate the fact that the application gets stuck quite often and even when you try to close is very irresponsible. Improve this application to be more fluent and I will give a higher rating
customer_reviews.author: Helni Costa

customer_reviews.title: Love music
customer_reviews.text: Really like this app lots of good music to take anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: How to use a ease of usage
customer_reviews.text: I find using this app to be stress free easy listening a the end of your finger tips for uses of every aga a great little gem
customer_reviews.author: Marty42 lilac63

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work. I just wish I could use Google on Kindles as I can on other Android and Apple products.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. I just wish I could use Google on Kindles as I can on other Android and Apple products.
customer_reviews.author: Shah Wharton

customer_reviews.title: don't do it
customer_reviews.text: In order to download this app I had to install the new and horrible Amazon app. Big mistake as it prevents me from logging in to my email account. so had to remove the Amazon app to cure email issue.
customer_reviews.author: Orangey

customer_reviews.title: Is it me?
customer_reviews.text: my first foray into streaming and downloading music, must say seems a bit awkward to start, I still don't know if I have actually downloaded an album yet... 8 year Android user, 45, not a big music connoisseur, but wants to learn!
customer_reviews.author: T. HOWE

customer_reviews.title: The worst thing is
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to access any of the music purchased from amazon and I am not sure if any other App can do that. The worst thing is, the cost for the music was taken from my account, and I have contacted amazon for some day now but I am yet to receive a response from them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Music
customer_reviews.text: I love the music it has all my favourite songs threre are millions to choose from l play amazon music every day
customer_reviews.author: alex mcintosh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and all up to date tune!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, I was surprised how I could listen to lots of different music with out paying for albums. A great way of streaming music, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: JerseyBecca

customer_reviews.title: byebye spotify, having prime is even better with free music!
customer_reviews.text: cancelled spotify straight away! having this as part of Prime! membership was such a good thing and there's quite a selection of stuff. I usually stick to playlists and listen to what I'm given so I'm very happy with this app
customer_reviews.author: MSVideoDiary

customer_reviews.title: What you waiting for
customer_reviews.text: Great app listen to what ever music you like create play lists or download a full album you can you can set it so it plays when there's no Internet
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: rubish
customer_reviews.text: you sell me digital music now no player don't work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon the App to beat all comers
customer_reviews.text: Amazon Music is the best music app that I have tried, god knows I have tried them all. The choices of music will be to everyones tastes and if your an amazon prime customer its even better cause its FREE !!!! Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: kevin  nye

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea. I use it on my One plus ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea. I use it on my One plus 2 and my ipad mini. being also able to download to the devices i can go out with no internet access and still play my music. Great
customer_reviews.author: Dave Berkon`

customer_reviews.title: It should be called Prime Time Music, as everything played is my choice
customer_reviews.text: having been brought up in the days of trying to find safe storage for records, and gramophone, i now have countless hours of music at my disposal
customer_reviews.author: john o neilt could have been written by many, of that time..

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, got all my music on my phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, got all my music on my phone and I get new music as it is released and just love using it
customer_reviews.author: Iain Burke

customer_reviews.title: great music player
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use, allows me to listen to my music on Samsung A3 without any bother. searches for music on phone or expansion card and automatically adds to library, as well as being able download purchased Amazon music
customer_reviews.author: Andrew E.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant I can now listen to my music on my mobile phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D. Storey
